createTranscription.description: Initiate a pre-recorded transcription job from an audio or video URL

props.name: audio_url
props.description: URL to a Gladia file or to an external audio or video file

props.name: languages
props.description: Select the language spoken in the audio for better transcription accuracy

props.name: code_switching
props.description: Enable code switching to handle multiple languages in the audio

props.name: subtitles
props.description: Enable subtitles generation for this transcription

props.name: subtitles_format
props.description: Select the subtitle format(s) for transcription output

props.name: diarization
props.description: Enable speaker recognition (diarization) for this audio

props.name: summarization_type
props.description: Choose the type of summarization to apply.

props.name: sentiment_analysis
props.description: Enable sentiment analysis for this audio

props.name: sentences
props.description: Enable sentence detection for this audio

props.name: custom_metadata
props.description: Add custom metadata to the transcription job

uploadAFile.description: Upload an audio or video file for use in a pre-recorded transcription job

props.name: audio_file
props.description: The audio or video file to upload
